<title level="1" right="Rules">[Kingdom Event DCs](/Rules.aspx?ID=1841)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 553</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A kingdom event's DC is always the kingdom's Control DC modified by the event's level modifier. 

<center>**Event DC = Control DC + event's level modifier**</center>
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
